languages.text: {n}Бунтовщик целую минуту смотрит на вас в неверии.{/n} "П-правда? Вы поможете? Император нас услышал, не иначе! Пожалуйста, пришлите еду скорее. Весь район голодает!"

{n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"
languages.original_text: {n}Бунтовщик целую минуту смотрит на вас в неверии.{/n} "П-правда? Вы поможете? Император нас услышал, не иначе! Пожалуйста, пришлите еду скорее. Весь район голодает!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

{n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

{n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

{n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

{n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

languages.text: {n}骚乱的民众以难以置信的眼神盯着你看，盯了整整一分钟。{/n}“真——真的吗？你愿意救我们吗？帝皇肯定是听到了我们的祈祷，祂肯定是听到了！求你了，快点送些食物过来吧！我们社区所有人都在挨饿！”
languages.original_text: {n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

traits.locale_text: {n}骚乱的民众以难以置信的眼神盯着你看，盯了整整一分钟。{/n}“真——真的吗？你愿意救我们吗？帝皇肯定是听到了我们的祈祷，祂肯定是听到了！求你了，快点送些食物过来吧！我们社区所有人都在挨饿！”

languages.text: {n}El alborotador te mira, incrédulo, durante todo un minuto.{/n} «De... ¿De verdad? ¿Nos va a ayudar? ¡El Emperador debe de haber escuchado nuestras plegarias! Por favor, no tarde en enviar la comida. ¡El barrio entero se muere de hambre!».
languages.original_text: {n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El alborotador te mira, incrédulo, durante todo un minuto.{/n} «De... ¿De verdad? ¿Nos va a ayudar? ¡El Emperador debe de haber escuchado nuestras plegarias! Por favor, no tarde en enviar la comida. ¡El barrio entero se muere de hambre!».

languages.text: {n}暴徒がしばらくポカンとこちらを見つめる。{/n}「ほ、本当ですか？助けてくださると…？皇帝が、皇帝が聞き入れてくださったんだ！すぐに食糧を送ってください。みな腹を空かせているんです！」
languages.original_text: {n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

traits.locale_text: {n}暴徒がしばらくポカンとこちらを見つめる。{/n}「ほ、本当ですか？助けてくださると…？皇帝が、皇帝が聞き入れてくださったんだ！すぐに食糧を送ってください。みな腹を空かせているんです！」

languages.text: {n}Der Aufrührer starrt dich eine ganze Minute lang ungläubig an.{/n} "W-wirklich? Ihr helft uns? Der Imperator muss uns gehört haben, es geht nicht anders! Bitte schickt das Essen bald. Unser ganzes Viertel hungert!"
languages.original_text: {n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aufrührer starrt dich eine ganze Minute lang ungläubig an.{/n} "W-wirklich? Ihr helft uns? Der Imperator muss uns gehört haben, es geht nicht anders! Bitte schickt das Essen bald. Unser ganzes Viertel hungert!"

languages.text: {n}L'émeutier vous observe une longue minute, incrédule.{/n} « V-vraiment ? Vous allez nous aider ? L'Empereur a dû nous entendre, alors ! Je vous en supplie, faites vite. Le quartier tout entier est affamé ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'émeutier vous observe une longue minute, incrédule.{/n} « V-vraiment ? Vous allez nous aider ? L'Empereur a dû nous entendre, alors ! Je vous en supplie, faites vite. Le quartier tout entier est affamé ! »

languages.text: {n}İsyancı, tam bir dakika boyunca inanmaz gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Gerçekten mi? Yardım edecek misiniz? İmparator dualarımızı duymuş, duymuş! Ne olur olabildiğince hızlı gönderin. Bütün mahal açlıktan ölüyor!"
languages.original_text: {n}The rioter stares at you in disbelief for a whole minute.{/n} "R-really? You'll help? The Emperor must have heard us, He must have! Please, send the food soon. Our whole neighbourhood is starving!"

traits.locale_text: {n}İsyancı, bir dakika boyunca inanmaz gözlerle bakıyor sana.{/n} "Gerçekten mi? Yardım edecek misiniz? İmparator dualarımızı duymuş, duymuş! Lütfen, olabildiğince hızlı gönderin. Bütün mahal açlıktan ölüyor!"
